name: Mountain Stronghold
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Gold] <within [2] tiles of a [Stone]> <when not at war>
Can only be built on [Hill] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain] tiles>
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <with [1] to [6] neighboring [Mountain Stronghold] tiles>
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [15] damage
